name: Tropical Isles
description:
––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

⎓⎓⎓⎓⎓ ◆⎨❖  Tropical  Isles  ❖⎬◆ ⎓⎓⎓⎓⎓

––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

–––––– ⏆ A game created by @Huckaroo ⏆ ––––––

Tropical Isles is a game about life in paradise, the goal of this game was to create something that is both ascetically pleasing and mentally rewarding. Its main goal is to be something to sit down and let yourself be immersed in the beautiful tropical archipelago.

I enjoy the smooth animations, they came together nicely. I hope you enjoy every moment of this game, it took 2 years so yea.

––––––––––––––––✦  How to play  ✦–––––––––––––––––

It's like any other game where you use the arrow keys to move around (WASD works too)

Using the space key will make you jump in the air

Press the z-key (or shift if you are playing on turbo warp) to sprint.

Click on food in trees or bushes to collect it

Click while holding food to eat and refill your hunger bar

Press the e-key to open up the inventory

✦~~~~~~~~~~~~~✦   Updates:   ✦~~~~~~~~~~~~~✦

Comment what you want me to add next.

I will try and answer all comments

DISCLAIMER:

You may be wondering why something this simple took me 2 years to make, the sad truth is that I had a far superior project than this, but over time I lost motivation. After about a year and a half, I realized that this would take more than 5 years to finish if I wanted to get everything done. So I started looking for solutions and I found one. Every week I will have you all vote for a new update, there will be around 5 options. After that week I will spend some time working on it, the reason for this is 2 things, 1: This will encourage me to keep updating and have the community supporting it 2: I want this game to be what you guys wish to be so that you can tell me what this game needs so I don't make a mistake and make something that everyone hates. I hope you understand that making a game is more complex than it seems, I have spent at least a tenth of my life on this, and I don't want this to be a massive disaster. By the way for people who are wondering this version was from March 2020.

I will add credits in the next update,

there is a lot.

The rest of the instructions will be cleaned up later.

Have fun playing this small version :D
